value.title: DAX Beginners - SUM Vs SUMX in Power BI - What, When and Where?
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with Dax beginner series. During this episode, we will talk about two interesting DAX expressions. SUM and SUMX. We will compare both DAX expressions in detail. value.title: Showing Ranking in a Visual in Power BI using RANKX DAX function
value.excerpt: If you want to show the ranking in a Power BI visual, one way is to use a visual that supports that, such as a Ribbon chart. value.title: Modify DAX filter context in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to describe filter context, which is used to evaluate measure formulas. You'll then learn why some calculations need to modify filter context and that it can be achieved by using the CALCULATE function. Additionally, you'll learn how to configure the CALCULATE function with filters and filter modifiers.
